name: Taxonomy Taxi – 2 Taxonomy 2 Taxi
author: postpostmodern, pinecone-dot-io

sections.description: Allows browsing all posts of any taxonomy type.
sections.installation:
1. Place /taxonomi-taxi-2/ directory in /wp-content/plugins/
  2. Rewrite rules should be flushed automatically on activation, if not save Permalink options, or delete the rewrite_rules setting in your options table.
  3. Where you could previously only see posts in one term at a url like http://domain/taxonomy/slug/, you can now see all posts with any term within the taxonomy at http://domain/taxonomy/ and http://domain/taxonomy/page/2/ etc.
